name: Mortyr: 2093-1944
description:
Rewrite History... Before you become it.

Mortyr 2093-1944 is a first-person 3d shoot 'em up that puts you in the role of a renegade mercenary from the future, send back to the dark days of World War II on a dangerous and unorthodox mission to change history forever. Your mysterious objective is heavily defended; your enemy is smart and well equipped. You can be sure they're not going to let you near without a fight. Somebody's going to get hurt, but the future of modern civilisation... and its past rests in your hands. It's up to you to give the enemy a history lesson they won't forget, the old fashioned way....
